description: Rear LH boundary(T1-T2) - 2x Cypress(Cupressus) REAR Garden-crown lift on larger tree removing inbound branches to main stem to height of 6m above ground-crown lift on smaller tree by removing inbound branches overhanging garden up to 5m above ground levelReasons -reduce overhang on both trees thereby reducing shading AND allowing more light into garden(T3-T4) - 2x Tall Olive(Oleo) -  REAR Garden-reduce crown by 40%(2.5m) to suitable growth points to allow greater separation form conservatoryIn rear garden nearest w/facing side of house(T5) -  REAR Garden - Sycamore(Acer pseudoplantanus)+extensive wisteria Climber growth-reduce length of all branches closest to roof line(squirrel route) to allow greater separation from property-remove all climber growth from roof line, gutters and chimney stack back to tree stemsAll works are for routine maintenance.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
